thread.title: Former NY Sen. Al D’Amato Escorted Off Plane After Ranting At Flight Crew (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Former NY Sen. Al D’Amato Escorted Off Plane After Ranting At Flight Crew (VIDEO)

author: Kristin Salaky
title: Former NY Sen. Al D’Amato Escorted Off Plane After Ranting At Flight Crew (VIDEO)
text:
Former Sen. Al D’Amato (R-NY) caused a stir Monday night when he was escorted off a flight for apparently trying to incite passengers into a chant and march against the flight crew, The New York Post reported.
Read More →
